title: idu pOdum aruLayyanE
sahitya:
idu pOdum aruLayyanE nAm inamottu manamottu dinamottirundAlE


anupallavi

  catur maraiyin shiramAna sakala kalai muDivAna shAntA nI en idaya vEndAgap-pOndaruLin


caraNam    ponnilE maNIpOlap-pUvilE maNam pOla unnuLLE nAnAgi ennuLLE nIyAgi
uyir turiya malaimElE uNarvariya kalaiyAlE onrAgi nanrAgi ninra nilai ninrAlE
